Name: Coffeeshop De Overkant
Review Text: Sat out here in the sun this morning. Came here yesterday too. It's great. I love to come to coffeeshops further out...this one is by far the best and friendliest. After smoking for around 12 years ...I recommend Neville's haze. It's fantastic. Great prices. And the hot chocolates are great. The edibles are also very good.

Name: Coffeeshop De Overkant
Review Text: Great shop, just far enough away from the town centre to avoid the queues! The staff are great, knowledgeable and chatty, the forbidden fruit weed and lemon haze hash are to die for! If you fancy a quiet smoke and coffee, check it out, you wont be disappointed !

Name: Coffeeshop De Overkant
Review Text: Cozy coffeeshop just outside the city center with lots of space to sit outside. Friendly staff and good selection. Would recommend you try out their Girl Scout Cookies strain.
